org.jdrupes.internal

Interface Matchable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent, ClassChannel, Event, Handler.NO_CHANNEL, Handler.NO_EVENT, NamedChannel, NamedEvent, Started

    public interface Matchable
    Author:
    mnl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getMatchKey()
      Returns the key used for matching.
      boolean matches(java.lang.Object handlerKey)
      Returns true if this Matchable matches the key used as filter by a handler.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchKey

        java.lang.Object getMatchKey()
        Returns the key used for matching.
        Returns:
        the key which usually is a String, a Class or an instance of Component (for channels only)

      • matches

        boolean matches(java.lang.Object handlerKey)
        Returns true if this Matchable matches the key used as filter by a handler.
        Parameters:
        handlerKey - the key used by the handler
